basics.name: Carlos Mario Gonzalez Sarmiento
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
I'm passionate about building applications and mastering every layer of development — from the user interface to business logic and architecture. I have experience working with different technologies and frameworks, which allows me to learn and adapt quickly to new environments.

Currently, I'm focused on mobile development with React Native, but I also have a strong background in backend development, working with NestJS, Express, and FastAPI, as well as databases like PostgreSQL and Docker environments. I don’t limit myself to a single stack — I enjoy understanding how the entire ecosystem works and choosing the best tools for each project.

education.area: Computer Engineering - Currently in second year
education.description: University education focused on the theoretical and practical foundations of software engineering, data structures, algorithms, databases, and distributed systems.

education.institution: Complementary Training in Web and Mobile Development
education.description:
Practical preparation for the professional world through: 
- Learning modern technologies such as React, React Native, Node.js, NestJS, FastAPI, and Docker 
- Continuous study of official technical documentation and specialized digital resources 
- Development of personal and collaborative projects focused on best practices and software architecture

work.name: Neworld
work.summary: I developed a complete online store, implementing a payment gateway with MercadoPago. I used SvelteKit to build both the frontend and backend, and managed the PostgreSQL database with Prisma as the ORM. The goal was to create a robust and scalable e-commerce platform.

youtube.subtitle: Chat App
youtube.summary: In this video, I show you the final result of developing a real-time chat with React Native (Expo) and FastAPI.

projects.name: Neworld online store
projects.description: Development of a fully functional technology store, with integration of the MercadoPago payment gateway to securely process transactions.

projects.name: CalAI
projects.description: Using artificial intelligence, it helps us obtain the calories and nutritional properties of the food we are about to eat just by taking a photo. We can save that information and track our daily calorie intake to observe how we eat over time.

projects.name: ChatGPT web
projects.description: ChatGPT clone with advanced features, including image and audio generation by integrating with the OpenAI API.

projects.name: ChatGPT mobile
projects.description: Mobile version of the ChatGPT clone, developed with React Native and Expo, enabling image and audio generation on mobile devices.

projects.name: Helpy
projects.description: A web platform to connect users with local professionals via an interactive map, making it easy to find and contact experts to solve service needs quickly and efficiently.

projects.name: ChatGPT backend
projects.description: RESTful API built with NestJS to manage client requests and integration with the OpenAI API, serving as the application's brain.

projects.name: Teslo store mobile
projects.description: E-commerce mobile application for a clothing store, developed with React Native and Expo to provide a seamless shopping experience.

projects.name: Teslo store web
projects.description: A complete e-commerce web platform for a clothing store, built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and a modern design.

projects.name: Teslo store backend
projects.description: Robust REST API developed with NestJS, designed to manage products, orders, and user authentication for the Teslo platform.

projects.name: Chat to your pdf
projects.description: Web application that allows users to interact with their PDF documents, asking questions and getting answers based on the file's content.

projects.name: Spotify clone
projects.description: Functional Spotify clone that allows browsing albums and playing songs, built with Astro, React, and Tailwind for a fast and modern interface.

projects.name: Kotflix
projects.description: Mobile application to browse movies currently in theaters, view details like synopsis and cast. Natively developed for Android with Kotlin.

projects.name: Todos
projects.description: Task management mobile application with user authentication and cloud data storage, using Firebase and React Native.
